issue.title: Thrusters Not Connected to Base Link in TF Tree

content.raw:
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/630057639-Old_Correct_TF_Tree.png)
_Figure 3: TF Tree from vrx.launch in old commit 5f734ca, which did not have the issue_

The issue is likely related to the recent thruster articulation PR. When the chassis-engine joint was `fixed` before, it was a static tf, so it was already connected. Now that the joint is `revolute`, it is not static, so the joint state message must be published.
content.html:
Figure 3: TF Tree from vrx.launch in old commit 5f734ca, which did not have the issue

The issue is likely related to the recent thruster articulation PR. When the chassis-engine joint was fixed before, it was a static tf, so it was already connected. Now that the joint is revolute, it is not static, so the joint state message must be published.
